title: Subchapter B - Property and Casualty Insurance
content:
Subchapter B - Property and Casualty Insurance

State Regulations

Part 60 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies And Supplementary Uninsured Motorists Insurance (Subpart 60-1 to 60-4)

Part 61 - Assessment Corporations (§ 61.1)

Part 62 - FIRE INSURANCE (Subpart 62-1 to 62-5)

Part 63 - Reserve Requirements For Financial Guaranty Insurance In-force Prior To The Effective Date Of Article 69 Of The Insurance Law (§ 63.0 to 63.5)

Part 64 - Liability Insurance Covering Snowmobiles And All-terrain Vehicles (§ 64.0 to 64.1)

Part 65 - Regulations Implementing The Comprehensive Motor Vehicle Insurance Reparations Act (Subpart 65-1 to 65-5)

Part 66 - Surety Bond Forms-waiver Of The Filing And Prior Approval Requirements Of Section 2307 Of The Insurance Law (§ 66.0 to 66.1)

Part 67 - Underwriting Inspection Requirement for Private Passenger Automoblies (§ 67.0 to 67.12)

Part 68 - Charges For Professional Health Services (§ 68.0 to 68.10)

Part 69 - Mortgage Pool Insurance (§ 69.0 to 69.6)

Part 70 - Medical Malpractice Insurance Rate Modifications, Provisional Rates, Required Policy Provisions And Availability Of Additional Coverages (§ 70.0 to 70.22)

Part 71 - Legal Defense Costs In Liability Policies (§ 71.0 to 71.8)

Part 72 - Indemnification Of Directors And Officers (§ 72.1 to 72.4)

Part 73 - Claims-made Policies; Scope Of Application; Minimum Standards (§ 73.0 to 73.10)

Part 74 - Homeowners Insurance Disclosure Information And Other Notices (§ 74.0 to 74.3)

Part 75 - Standards For Insurance That Qualifies For The Environmental Remediation Insurance Tax Credit (§ 75.0 to 75.3)

Part 76 - Commercial Crime Coverage Exclusions (§ 76.0 to 76.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 60 - Minimum Provisions For Automobile Liability Insurance Policies And Supplementary Uninsured Motorists Insurance (Subpart 60-1 to 60-4)
